education.description: I have completed my BSc in CSE degree from Eastern University, Dhaka, which is one of the reputed universities in Bangladesh.
I have completed my diploma degree from the Department of Computer Science and Technology (CST) at Feni Computer Institute, which is the first ICT-based technical institute in Bangladesh.
